income_messages:
From: a**********************5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-14 22:25:25
SUBJECT: Hello,
Hello,
Warm greetings to you.
With respect to your business profile, I would like to inform you
about a viable project my bank is running.
We are running complimentary packages for our valued customers and any
party that is interested in joining the program. The project was
launched after the lockdown, we are giving incentives for foreign
direct investments, and also operating financing incentive such as
fund, which are in direct monetary form.
In a nutshell, I am an asset manager with ZIRAAT BANK in ISTANBUL
TURKEY. I have been assigned to oversee this operation and arrange the
files for continuous assessment and business development in my bank.
Interestingly there’s a hedge fund under my supervision, the asset is
enough to cover any projects you can present. For mutual interest, I
can make the funds available to you if you have any project that is
profitable, reach me via email:amrmohamedabdelfattah129@gmail.com.
Kindly give this opportunity a considerable attention.
Best wishes,
AMR MOHAMED ABDELFATTAH HANAFY, Ph.D
From: a**********************5@gmail.com
To: pi02054@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-21 15:29:37
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Good day.
We are very sorry for the delay in getting back to you, this was due to the
fasting period and the observation here in Turkey, but by Tuesday next
week, we are going to resume properly and get back to business.
We hereby assure you that all your demands will be met, but first we need
to clarify some of the necessary steps required to ensure that you are
qualified for the incentive programs our bank is running, as that is the
main purpose of our arrangement.
In relation to that, we need you to send a summary of your business plan
with the project attached for review. Also include your whatsapp number and
detailed information for consideration.
Thanks and best wishes,
Yours faithfully
Secretary: BADAR MUBARAK KHAMIS ALAWD ALDOSERI
For: AMR MOHAMED ABDELFATTAH HANAFY, Ph.D
outbound_messages:
From: pi02054@l******s.email
To: a**********************5@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-14 22:25:30
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Dear AMR MOHAMED HANAFY,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding your bank's project. I am interested in learning more about the incentives and financing options that are available. Can you please provide me with more details about the project and the types of projects that are eligible for funding? 
Also, I would like to know more about the asset manager who is overseeing this operation. Can you provide me with their name and contact information? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Violet
From: pi02054@l******s.email
To: a**********************5@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-21 16:13:15
SUBJECT: Re: Hello,
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for your response. I understand the delay and appreciate your update. I will be happy to provide you with the necessary information and documents for the incentive programs your bank is running.
I have attached a summary of my business plan along with the project details for your review. My WhatsApp number is +1-XXX-XXX-XXXX. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification.
Thank you and best regards.
Best wishes,
Violet
